snippet: GOLDSTEIN--Richard L.,76, of Purchase, NY, on May 29, 2016. Adored son of the late Ella and Jack Goldstein. Devoted husband of 52 years to the late Eileen. Beloved father of Felicia (Bruce) DePaola and Gabrielle Goldstein. Cherished Grandpa Richie to Tucker and Emma. Loving brother to Norman and Sam. Hofstra Basketball 1957-61. Hofstra Athletics Hall of Fame. He will be loved and missed forever. Donations may be made to Naomi Berrie Diabetes Center or JDRF. 1/3
